00143         bool search(const KeyType& key, SDBCursor& locn)
00144         {
00145                 SkipNode* x = header_;
00146                 int h = x->height-1;
00147                 if (sfh_.numItem == 0)
00148                 return false;
00149                 while (h>=0) {
00150                         x->loadRight(h, dataFile_);
00151                         while (x->right[h] && comp_(key, x->right[h]->KEY)> 0 )
00152                         {       x = x->loadRight(h, dataFile_);
00153                                 if( x->right[h] )x->loadRight(h, dataFile_);
00154                         }
00155                         if( x->right[h] && comp_( key, x->right[h]->KEY) == 0 ) {
00156                                 locn = x->right[h];
00157                                 return true;
00158                         }
00159                         --h;
00160                 }
00161                 return false;
00162         }
00163 
00164         bool get(const KeyType& key, ValueType& value)
00165         {
00166                 SkipNode *p =searchPre(key);
00167                 if (p) {
00168                         value = p->right[0]->element.get_value();
00169                         return true;
00170                 }
00171                 return false;
00172         }

00204         KeyType getNearest(const KeyType& key) {
00205 
00206                 SkipNode* x = header_;
00207                 KeyType rk;
00208 
00209                 int h = x->height-1;
00210                 if (sfh_.numItem == 0)
00211                 return rk;
00212                 while (h>=0) {
00213                         x->loadRight(h, dataFile_);
00214                         while (x->right[h] && comp_(key, x->right[h]->KEY)> 0 )
00215                         {       x = x->loadRight(h, dataFile_);
00216                                 if(x->right[h])x->loadRight(h, dataFile_);
00217                         }
00218                         if(h == 0 && x->right[h] ) {
00219                                 return x->right[h]->KEY;
00220                         }
00221                         if( x->right[h] && comp_( key, x->right[h]->KEY) == 0 ) {
00222                                 return key;
00223                         }
00224                         --h;
00225                 }
00226                 return rk;

00267         void commit() {
00268                 //cout<<"commiting... "<<endl;
00269                 //sfh_.headerPos = header_->fpos;
00270                 sfh_.toFile(dataFile_);
00271                 //sfh_.display();
00272 
00273                 while ( !dirtyPages_.empty() ) {
00274                         SkipNode* p = dirtyPages_.back();
00275                         dirtyPages_.pop_back();
00276                         if (p)
00277                         p->write(dataFile_);
00278                 }
00279                 for (vector<MemBlock*>::iterator it=mbList.begin(); it !=mbList.end(); it++) {
00280                         if (*it)
00281                         (*it)->flush(dataFile_);
00282                 }
00283 
00284         }
00290         void flush() {
00291                 commit();
00292                 vector<MemBlock*>::iterator it, it1;
00293                 for (it=mbList.begin(); it != mbList.end(); it++) {
00294                         it1 = it;
00295                         delete (*it1);
00296                         *it1 = 0;
00297                 }
00298 
00299         }

00310         bool open() {
00311                 // We're creating if the file doesn't exist.
00312                 struct stat statbuf;
00313                 bool creating = stat(fileName_.c_str(), &statbuf);
00314 
00315                 dataFile_ = fopen(fileName_.c_str(), creating ? "w+b" : "r+b");
00316                 if ( 0 == dataFile_) {
00317                         cout<<"Error in open(): open file failed"<<endl;
00318                         return false;
00319                 }
00320                 // Create a new node
00321                 bool ret = false;
00322                 if (creating) {
00323 
00324 #ifdef DEBUG
00325                         cout<<"creating...\n"<<endl;
00326                         sfh_.display();
00327 #endif
00328 
00329                         // when creating, write the node to the disk.
00330                         // remember that the first four bytes contain
00331                         // the address of the root node.                        
00332 
00333                         // If creating, allocate a node instead of
00334                         // reading one.
00335                         header_ = allocateNode_();
00336                         header_->height = 1;
00337                         //sfh_.headerPos = header_->fpos;
00338                         sfh_.toFile(dataFile_);
00339 
00340                         dirtyPages_.push_back(header_);
00341                         ret = true;
00342                 } else {
00343                         if ( !sfh_.fromFile(dataFile_) ) {
00344                                 return false;
00345                         } else {
00346                                 if (sfh_.magic != 0x061561) {
00347                                         cout<<"Error, read wrong file header_\n"<<endl;
00348                                         return false;
00349                                 }
00350 #ifdef DEBUG
00351                                 cout<<"open exist...\n"<<endl;
00352                                 sfh_.display();
00353 #endif
00354 
00355                                 mbList.resize(sfh_.nNode/BLOCK_SIZE+1);
00356                                 if(sfh_.numItem == 0) {
00357                                         header_ = allocateNode_();
00358                                         header_->height = 1;
00359                                         sfh_.toFile(dataFile_);
00360                                         dirtyPages_.push_back(header_);
00361                                 }
00362                                 else {
00363                                         header_ = new SkipNode;
00364                                         header_ -> fpos = sfh_.headerPos;
00365                                         header_ -> read(dataFile_);
00366                                 }
00367 
00368                                 //header_->display();
00369                                 ret = true;
00370                         }
00371                         // If note creating, just create and read
00372                         // rather than allocating.
00373                 }
00374 
00375                 SkipNode::setDataSize(maxDataSize_, sfh_.pageSize);
00376                 return ret;
00377         }

00383                 release();
00384                 return true;

00568 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType,
00569                 typename Alloc> ValueType * SkipListFile<KeyType, ValueType, LockType,
00570                 Alloc>::find(const KeyType & key) {
00571 
00572         SkipNode *p =searchPre(key);
00573         ValueType* pv= NULL;
00574         if (p) {
00575                 pv = new ValueType( p->right[0]->element.get_value() );
00576         }
00577         return pv;
00578 }

00607 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType,
00608                 typename Alloc> bool SkipListFile<KeyType, ValueType, LockType, Alloc>::insert1(
00609                 const DataType& v) {
00610 
00611         SkipNode *t, *x;
00612 
00613         x = header_;
00614         register int h = header_->height-1;
00615 
00616         vector<SkipNode*> update;
00617 
00618         while (h>=0) {
00619                 while (x->right[h] && comp_(v.get_key(), x->right[h]->KEY)> 0) {
00620                         x = x->loadRight(h, dataFile_);
00621                 }
00622                 update.push_back(x);
00623                 if( x->right[h] && comp_( v.get_key(), x->right[h]->KEY) == 0 ) {
00624                         /*promote_(x->right[h],update);
00625                          int fromBand = 1;
00626                          int toBand = whichBand(h);
00627                          demote_(fromBand, toBand);*/
00628                         return false;
00629                 }
00630                 --h;
00631         }
00632 
00633         int height = coin_flip(sfh_.degree);
00634         if( height >= header_->height ) {
00635                 height = header_->height;
00636                 ++sfh_.height;
00637                 ++header_->height;
00638                 dirtyPages_.push_back(header_);
00639                 assert(header_->height <= MAX_LEVEL);
00640         }
00641         t = allocateNode_();
00642         t->element = v;
00643         t->height = height;
00644 
00645         typename
00646         vector<SkipNode*>::iterator it = update.end();
00647         --it;
00648         for(int i=0; i<height; i++)
00649         {
00650                 SkipNode* p = *it;
00651                 it--;
00652                 t->right[i] = p->right[i];
00653                 if( p->right[i] )p->right[i]->left[i] = t->right[i];
00654 
00655                 p->right[i] = t;
00656                 dirtyPages_.push_back(p);
00657         }
00658         dirtyPages_.push_back(t);
00659         sfh_.numItem++;
00660         return true;
00661 }
00662 
00666 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType,
00667                 typename Alloc> bool SkipListFile<KeyType, ValueType, LockType, Alloc>::insert(
00668                 const DataType& v) {
00669         SkipNode *t, *x;
00670         x = header_;
00671         int h = x->height - 1;
00672 
00673         while (h>=0 && x) {
00674                 while (x->right[h] && comp_(v.get_key(), x->right[h]->KEY)> 0) {
00675                         x = x->loadRight(h, dataFile_);
00676                 }
00677 
00678                 if( x->right[h] && comp_( v.get_key(), x->right[h]->KEY) == 0 ) {
00679                         return false;
00680                 }
00681                 SkipNode* temp = x;
00682 
00683                 bool isSplit = false;
00684                 if( h-1 >=0 ) {
00685                         if( temp->right[h-1] ) temp = temp->loadRight(h-1,dataFile_);
00686                         if( temp->right[h-1] ) temp = temp->loadRight(h-1, dataFile_);
00687                         if( temp->right[h-1] ) {
00688                                 temp = temp->loadRight(h-1, dataFile_);
00689                                 isSplit = true;
00690                         }
00691                 }
00692 
00693                 if ( (h == 0 )
00694                 || ( isSplit
00695                                 && (x->right[h] == temp->right[h-1]
00696                                                 || ( (x->right[h] && temp->right[h-1])
00697                                                                 && (temp->right[h-1]->isLoaded)
00698                                                                 && (x->right[h]->KEY> temp->right[h-1]->KEY) ) ) ) )
00699                 {
00700                         if( h == 0 ) {
00701                                 t = allocateNode_();
00702                                 t->element = v;
00703                         }
00704                         else {
00705                                 t = x->right[h-1] ->right[h-1];
00706                         }
00707 
00708                         t->height++;
00709                         t->right[h] = x->right[h];
00710 
00711                         t->isDirty = true;
00712                         dirtyPages_.push_back(t);
00713 
00714                         x->right[h] = t;
00715                         x->isDirty = true;
00716                         dirtyPages_.push_back(x);
00717                 }
00718                 --h;
00719 
00720         }
00721 
00722         if (header_->right[header_->height-1] != NULL) {
00723                 header_->height++;
00724                 dirtyPages_.push_back(t);
00725         }
00726         sfh_.numItem++;
00727         return true;
00728 }
00729 
00730 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType,
00731                 typename Alloc> bool SkipListFile<KeyType, ValueType, LockType, Alloc>::del(
00732                 const KeyType& key) {
00733 
00734         SkipNode* x = header_;
00735         int h = x->height - 1;
00736         SkipNode* p = 0;
00737         while (h>=0) {
00738                 while (x->right[h] && comp_(key, x->right[h]->KEY)> 0 ) {
00739                         x = x->loadRight(h,dataFile_);
00740                 }
00741                 if( !x )return 0;
00742                 if( x->right[h] && key == x->right[h]->KEY) {
00743                         x->isDirty = true;
00744                         dirtyPages_.push_back(x);
00745                         p = x->right[h];
00746                         x->right[h] = p->right[h];
00747                 }
00748                 --h;
00749         }
00750 
00751         if ( header_->height>1 && header_->right[header_->height-2] == NULL) {
00752                 --header_->height;
00753                 dirtyPages_.push_back(header_);
00754         }
00755         if( p ) {
00756                 delete p;
00757                 p = 0;
00758                 --sfh_.numItem;
00759                 return true;
00760         }
00761 
00762         return 0;
00763 }
00764 
00771 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType,
00772                 typename Alloc> const KeyType* SkipListFile<KeyType, ValueType,
00773                 LockType, Alloc>::find_min() const {
00774 
00775         SkipNode *current = header_;
00776         if (header_->right[0])
00777                 return &(header_->right[0]->KEY);
00778                 else
00779                 return NULL;
00780         }
00787 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType,
00788                 typename Alloc> const KeyType* SkipListFile<KeyType, ValueType,
00789                 LockType, Alloc>::find_max() const {
00790         if (num_items() == 0)
00791                 return NULL;
00792 
00793         SkipNode *current = header_;
00794         int h = current->height-2;
00795         while (h>=0) {
00796                 if (current->right[h] != NULL)
00797                         current = current->right[h];
00798                 else {
00799                         if (h == 0)
00800                                 return &(current->KEY);
00801                                 else
00802                                 h--;
00803                         }
00804                 }
00805                 return NULL;
00806         }
00807 
00811 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType,
00812                 typename Alloc> void SkipListFile<KeyType, ValueType, LockType, Alloc>::release() {
00813 
00814         vector<MemBlock*>::iterator it, it1;
00815         for (it = mbList.begin(); it != mbList.end(); it++) {
00816                 it1 = it;
00817                 delete *it1;
00818         }
00819 }

00826 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType,
00827                 typename Alloc> inline bool SkipListFile<KeyType, ValueType, LockType,
00828                 Alloc>::is_empty() const {
00829         return (sfh_.numItem == 0);
00830 }
00831 
00835 template <typename KeyType, typename ValueType, typename LockType,
00836                 typename Alloc> void SkipListFile<KeyType, ValueType, LockType, Alloc>::print_list(
00837                 std::ostream& os) const {
00838         SkipNode *current = header_;
00839         //header_->display();
00840         int h = header_->height-1;
00841         int a = 0;
00842         int b = 1;
00843         bool counted = false;
00844         while (h>=0) {
00845                 current = header_;
00846                 while (current) {
00847                         os<<current->element.get_key()<<" -> ";
00848                         current = current->right[h];
00849                 }
00850                 os<<" tail "<<endl;
00851                 if (counted)
00852                         b++;
00853                 h--;
00854                 a++;
00855         }
00856 }
